rules_key2: Hume apne bartan khud dhone hote hai.
rules_key5: - ek dustbin jo kitchen mei hai jis mei aap organic cheezein - jaise fruits ke cheelke, bacha hua khan, ande ke chilke, jaisa waste daaloge.
rules_key6: - doosra dustbin jo bahar hai jis mei aap baaki samaan daaloge.
rules_key7: NavGurukul campus mein non-vegeratian food (except eggs) allowed nahi hai.
rules_key8: Har class aapko time se start karni hai.
rules_key9: Hindi gaane sunna avoid karein. Aap english gaane sunoge, aur unko samajhne ki koshish karoge. Isse aapki English improve hogi.
